After "Dropbox" which is a folder, there are many more folders in the list which I did not copy in here.

The modification date of the folder was different on sending and pulling node. After restarting and waiting for a sync the modification date was still different on both nodes (not synced from what i remember reading somewhere?) but it was not in the needed list any more. The both files also were pulled succesfully.

Another thing: changing other files (in the same repo, did not test other repos) also put them into the "need" list after I saw the bug the first time and never get synced until a restart.
